title: Border dispute with China, Pakistan proxy war among six challenges for India: CDS Chauhan
description: Pakistan and China's nuclear capabilities form the fifth challenge, complicating the calculus of conventional warfare..India national security challenges, China border dispute India, Pakistan proxy war, Multi-domain warfare, Nuclear threat India, Military technology advancements, Artificial intelligence in warfare, CDS General Anil Chauhan, Operation Sindoor, India-China relations, Line of Actual Control (LAC), Geopolitical risks for India, Future war strategies, National security advisor Ajit Doval, Bleeding India by a thousand cuts strategy
content:
Chief of Defence Staff (CDS) General Anil Chauhan on Friday outlined six key national security challenges confronting India, stressing that the country must be prepared for future wars that will not be confined to land, air, or sea.

title: Warner Bros. Sues Midjourney for AI-Generated Images of Superman, Bugs Bunny and Other Characters
description: Warner Bros. is suing artificial intelligence company Midjourney for copyright infringement, alleging that the startup enables its millions of subscribers to create AI-generated images and videos of copyrighted characters like Superman and Bugs Bunny.

title: Oakland AIs? The Ballers will be first professional sports team managed by AI
description: On Saturday, the Oakland Ballers of the independent Pioneer League will be the first team to be managed in-game by artificial intelligence.
content: In the early 2000s, the Oakland A’s became synonymous with using data to create a competitive advantage when “Moneyball” gave baseball fans a glimpse behind the curtain of the A’s statistical-minded front office. A quarter century later, a new team i... [7178 chars]

title: AI Agents | Smart agents of change
description: It’s the buzzword in Artificial Intelligence (AI) and among the top technology trends of 2025.
content: If digital assistants needed only a voice command to switch channels on the television, or turn on the air-conditioner, AI agents aim beyond such simple automation. They are designed to write software code, put together a spreadsheet from a chunk of ... [281 chars]

title: Inside eBay’s quest to become an AI leader
description: How the 30-year-old e-commerce giant is going all-in on artificial intelligence, hoping the technology can help it update its image and beat mounting competition.
content: The company rode the internet’s early e-commerce boom and the dawn of the mobile era to become a publicly traded billion-dollar firm, but has since faced activist investor pressure amid slowing sales from inflation-weary consumers and intense competi... [6257 chars]

title: Generativity, coordination, sustaining: The three pillars of true AI identified
description: For decades, artificial intelligence has been evaluated primarily on breadth of performance: the more tasks a system could perform and the more fluently it handled diverse domains, the closer it was assumed to be to human-level intelligence. This paradigm, the study notes, stems from early milestones such as Turing’s test, which equated indistinguishability from human performance with intelligence, and has been reinforced by modern advances in large language models that exhibit striking versatility.
content: Artificial intelligence has rapidly moved from research labs to everyday life, powering everything from voice assistants and autonomous systems to advanced language models that generate human-like text and code. Despite these breakthroughs, one quest... [6879 chars]
